components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I can't implement the backgroundColor for a picker column for an iOS 7 picker.  I noticed there were older Q&A comments that this was never implemented.  Can you please clarify whether or not I should be able to do this?  If so, it seems like a bug.  Same question for borderColor.
fields.summary: iOS pickerColumn backgroundColor does not change

comments.body: Titanium does not support changing the backgroundColor for the picker. There is already an improvement request TIMOB-16547 for this feature.
